articles.title: Hollywood's behind-the-scenes crews vote to authorize strike - Business News - Castanet.net
articles.description: Film and television production in North America is in jeopardy of coming to a standstill after its behind-the-scenes workers overwhelmingly voted to authorize a strike for the first time in its 128-year history.
